en: Tutorial
Welcome to [pulse freq=2][color=MEDIUM_VIOLET_RED]Spud Customs Training![/color][/pulse]
This training will teach you the [wave amp=15 freq=2][color=DARK_ORANGE]essential skills[/color][/wave] needed to protect Spud's borders.
Your duty is to process incoming potatoes at our border checkpoint.
Immigrating potatoes will line up outside your office here.
To start processing potatoes, you need to open your booth for service with the switch here.
You'll signal each potato to approach your office by tapping the megaphone.
Potatoes will enter the booth one by one and present their documents.
First, move their documents over to the inspection table for a better look.
Then, look for [tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=YELLOW]expired dates, incorrect information, or signs of forgery[/color][/tornado].
Your desk has stamps for marking documents, you can click here to pull the stamp bar out.
Click the stamp to mark documents as [color=CHARTREUSE]approved[/color] or [color=CRIMSON]rejected[/color] and drag the document back to the potato to finalize your decision!
Sometimes, potatoes will try to [color=CRIMSON]rush past your checkpoint[/color].
You have a direct uplink in your booth, which allows you to control [pulse freq=3][color=CRIMSON]missile launchers[/color][/pulse] along the border wall.
Click on these \runners\" to launch a missile and stop them."
Remember, each runner that gets through will count as a [wave amp=20 freq=3][color=CRIMSON]strike against you[/color][/wave].
Too many strikes, and your shift will end... [tornado radius=3 freq=3][color=CRIMSON]permanently.[/color][/tornado]
Each shift has a [color=DARK_ORANGE]quota of potatoes[/color] you need to process to finish your day.
First Day
Welcome to your first day at [color=MEDIUM_VIOLET_RED]Spud Customs[/color], Officer!
Remember to check the [color=YELLOW]rules[/color] carefully. They change every day!
The Spud border is in [pulse freq=3][color=CRIMSON]chaos[/color][/pulse]. Panicked potatoes flood checkpoints, desperate to escape after the leaked documents.
You slip through with Sasha. [wave amp=20 freq=3][color=CHARTREUSE]We have to keep pushing![/color][/wave] The people know the truth now.

They can't silence the truth any longer. If we can infiltrate the [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color] facility and broadcast evidence, it'll [tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=CHARTREUSE]ignite the revolution[/color][/tornado].
